para.text: After selecting an edition and clicking on the right mouse button a context menu will open with the following options:

li.text: - use this option to update the list of all class editions. This is useful when multiple developers are working with the same repository. If another developer just added a class edition to the repository you can update the list without having to reopen the browser window.
- use this option to load the selected class edition.
- use this option to compare two selected class editions with each other. This option enabled only when two class editions are selected in the list.
